title: Tek Yürek
overview: Halit, who lives in Canada, is left alone with his daughter Deniz and his son Rüzgar after losing his wife. An event in which he lives with a player on his team leads to an end of his career. He goes back to his father's house in Istanbul with his children. At the same time, he meets by chance with the Mayor of his district and he becomes aware of the ice rink. The president is a visionary, an entrepreneur who is fond of sport. He founded the ice rink many years ago and wanted to encourage people to skate within the scope of the Recycling project. Now it's time to do bigger things in this place. This beautiful coincidence gives Halit a new opportunity, he will set up an ice-hockey team, but with whom?
